column1: Ha ha ha ha ha! We scared you, chickens!
Oh no? Well, you should be!  The pirate ghosts are gonna come getcha!
Didn't you know? There's an old legend in South Park that says these docks are haunted by pirate ghosts.
Yuh-huh. They roam these docks with their swords and hook-hands  looking for victims tuh...  cut up!
Ha ha ha ha, gotcha again, heh ha ha!  Just wait till tomorrow! We're gonna scare you kids to death! Ha ha ha haa!
